theoryTitle: Straw Hat Time Skip Training Predictions
theoryText: Before the Return to Sabaody arc aired, fans theorized extensively about what training each Straw Hat underwent during the two-year timeskip. Many correctly predicted Luffy would learn Haki, that Franky would upgrade his cyborg body, and that the crew would return significantly more powerful. Episode 519 begins to confirm these theories as the crew reunites and showcases their new abilities.
author: One Piece Community (Various)

theoryText: Fans correctly interpreted Luffy's 'SA2Y' tattoo message (seen in earlier episodes) as a signal to the crew to meet at Sabaody Archipelago in 2 years instead of the originally planned 3 days. This theory was widely accepted before being confirmed when the crew successfully reunites at Sabaody in episodes 517-519.
author: One Piece Community (Various)

theoryText: When Caribou debuted in Episode 519, fans immediately speculated he would play a significant antagonistic role in the upcoming Fish-Man Island arc. His high bounty, Logia Devil Fruit, and cruel nature suggested he would cause trouble for the Straw Hats or the residents of Fish-Man Island. This theory proved correct as Caribou became a recurring threat throughout the arc.
author: One Piece Community (Various)
